name: PullTokensProxy
description: Pulls a specified amount of tokens from the EOA owner account to the proxy.

functionDecorators.name: pullTokens
functionDecorators.description: Pulls a token from the proxyOwner -> proxy. Proxy owner must first give approve to the proxy address.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of tokens which will be transfered to the proxy.
